message: I propose we split the money 90/10, with me getting the larger share. I think this is a fair starting point, but I'm open to negotiation.
Alice, your offer was a bit imbalanced. Let's be fairer to each other. I propose 60/40.
Bob, your offer was still a bit high for me. I'm proposing a split of 55/45. I'm willing to compromise, but we need to move closer to a fairer distribution.
Alice, this is getting us nowhere. We're losing money with every round! Let's just split it evenly and call it a day.
